  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1191</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Achan takes the spoils of Jericho5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Achan nimmt verdirbt von Jericho5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Achan prend se corrompt de Jericho5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Achan faz exame do spoils de Jericho5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Achan prende guasta di Jericho5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Achan παίρνει χαλά Jericho5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Achan toma estropea de Jericho5</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Independent study. learners study Sefer Yehoshua 7:16-26 and review the entire chapter by writing a play/poem about the life of Achan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sefer Yehoshua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bble</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">achan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unabhängige Studie Anfänger studieren Sefer 
Yehoshua 7:16-26 und wiederholen das gesamte Kapitel, indem sie ein 
play/poem über die Lebensdauer von Achan schreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants indépendants d'étude étudient 
Sefer Yehoshua 7:16-26 et passent en revue le chapitre entier en 
écrivant un play/poem au sujet de la vie d'Achan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os learners independentes do estudo estudam Sefer
Yehoshua 7:16-26 e revêem o capítulo inteiro escrevendo um play/poem
sobre a vida de Achan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I principianti indipendenti di studio studiano 
Sefer Yehoshua 7:16-26 e rivedono l'intero capitolo scrivendo un 
play/poem circa la durata di Achan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ανεξάρτητοι αρχάριοι μελέτης μελετούν Sefer 
Yehoshua 7:1626 και αναθεωρούν το ολόκληρο κεφάλαιο με το 
γράψιμο ενός παιχνιδιού/ενός ποιήματος για τη ζωή Achan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los principiantes independientes del estudio 
estudian Sefer Yehoshua 7:16-26 y repasan el capítulo entero 
escribiendo un play/poem sobre la vida de Achan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sefer Yehoshua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
